name: Cartley
description: Cartley is a robust WhatsApp engagement platform designed to help businesses automate, personalize, and scale customer interactions. With no-code chatbot builders and smart automation tools, Cartley simplifies complex workflows, supports lead conversion, cart recovery, and instant customer service with human handover. The platform offers a unified inbox and supports multi-channel messaging across WhatsApp. Key features include personalized broadcasts, integrated sales funnels, AI-powered support, and seamless Meta API integration. Cartley empowers teams with marketing and sales automation, customer engagement tools, and intelligent chatbot managementâ€”all without writing code.
